title: Hymen's præludia, or Loves master-peice being that so much admired romance, intituled Cleopatra : in twelve parts / written originally in the French, and now elegantly rendred into English by Robert Loveday.
author: La Calprenède, Gaultier de Coste, seigneur de, d. 1663.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Gaultier de Coste la Calprenède.  Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Parts 1-6 were translated by Robert Loveday; pt. 7 by John Coles; pt. 8 by James Webb; and pt. 9-12 by John Davies.
